# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | ✅                 |
| < 1.0   | ❌                 |

## Reporting Vulnerabilities
**Do not** open public issues for vulnerabilities.

Email: elmehdi.makroumi@gmail.com
Response SLA: 48 hours

## Best Practices
- Sanitize SQL before sharing logs
- Use `--no-color` in CI
- Keep SlowQL updated
- Review detector findings regularly
